resources.string:
This game mode is availa ble for full version only!

Key benefits of full version:
♥ Time Attack Mode Available
♥ Garbage Mode Available
♥ 100% Ads Free
♥ No permissions

To develop more great live wallpapers, we need some donation to keep running. Please support us and download the full version.
Una muda wa kutosha kujipatia alama nyingi iwezekanavyo huku kasi ikiongezeka.
Maliza mistari mingi iwezekavyo kwa dakika tano. Kasi haidiliki.
Maliza mistari yote ili usalie na mistari mitatu ya vipande haraka iwekanavyo.
Guza sehemu tarajiwa ya kipande kidondokacho ili kuzidisha kasi ya kudondoka.
Geuza kipande kidondoka kushoto au kulia kwa upande wako.

Tumia ishara yako kuongoza vipande, ishara ya kulia hugeuza kipande kwelekea kulia ilhali ishara ya kushoto hugeuza kipande kushoto. Kuguza sehemu tarajiwa, kipande kitadondoka kwa kasi zaidi. Ukiguza kipande kinachoanguka huzungusha kipande kwa mzunguko wa akrabu.
Punde mviringo wa usawa wa vipande 15 umejazwa mstari huo utadondoka na utapata alama 10. Ikiwa mistari mingi itadondoshwa kwa wakati mmoja utapata alama za ziada.
